mapper.select:
select comm_cd, comm_nm, comm_desc, create_user_id, create_dt, update_user_id, update_dt from TB_COMM_CD
AND comm_cd LIKE '%' || #{commCd} || '%'
AND comm_nm LIKE '%' || #{commNm} || '%'
AND comm_desc LIKE '%' || #{commDesc} || '%'
AND create_user_id LIKE '%' || #{createUserId} || '%'
AND create_dt LIKE '%' || #{createDt} || '%'
AND update_user_id LIKE '%' || #{updateUserId} || '%'
AND update_dt LIKE '%' || #{updateDt} || '%'

select comm_dtl_cd, comm_cd, comm_dtl_nm, comm_dtl_desc, use_yn, create_user_id, create_dt, update_user_id, update_dt from TB_COMM_DTL_CD
AND comm_dtl_cd LIKE '%' || #{commDtlCd} || '%'
AND comm_cd LIKE '%' || #{commCd} || '%'
AND comm_dtl_nm LIKE '%' || #{commDtlNm} || '%'
AND comm_dtl_desc LIKE '%' || #{commDtlDesc} || '%'
AND use_yn LIKE '%' || #{useYn} || '%'
AND create_user_id LIKE '%' || #{createUserId} || '%'
AND create_dt LIKE '%' || #{createDt} || '%'
AND update_user_id LIKE '%' || #{updateUserId} || '%'
AND update_dt LIKE '%' || #{updateDt} || '%'
SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_NM , COMM_DESC , CREATE_USER_ID , CREATE_DT , UPDATE_USER_ID , UPDATE_DT FROM TB_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = #{commCd}

SELECT COMM_DTL_CD , COMM_CD , COMM_DTL_NM , COMM_DTL_DESC , USE_YN , CREATE_USER_ID , CREATE_DT , UPDATE_USER_ID , UPDATE_DT FROM TB_COMM_DTL_CD WHERE COMM_CD = #{commCd} AND COMM_DTL_CD = #{commDtlCd}
